data: The organization Global Academy of Arts and Sciences is an institution.
The organization Global Academy of Arts and Sciences operates in the Education industry and offers interdisciplinary programs that bridge creative expression with scientific inquiry.
The organization Global Academy of Arts and Sciences is located in London, United Kingdom at 10 Regent Street.
The organization Global Academy of Arts and Sciences offers undergraduate, graduate, and professional development courses.
The organization Global Academy of Arts and Sciences facilitates collaborative research, studio workshops, and international exchange programs.
The organization Global Academy of Arts and Sciences features state-of-the-art laboratories, galleries, and performance spaces.
The organization Global Academy of Arts and Sciences employs faculty members who are renowned practitioners and scholars committed to mentorship and discovery.
The organization Global Academy of Arts and Sciences alumni have led groundbreaking projects in research institutions, galleries, and technology firms.
